### 🔐 Security Policy

#### Supported Versions

We currently support the latest stable version of `wavecord`.

| Version      | Supported? |
|--------------|------------|
| main / dev   | ✅ Yes      |
| older tags   | ❌ No       |

### Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in `wavecord`, **please report it responsibly**

- 📧 Email: `security@wavecord.dev`
- 🐙 GitHub: [Private vulnerability report](https://github.com/error44s/wavecord/security/advisories/new)

Please include:
- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Your environment (Python version, OS, etc.)
- Any relevant logs or code snippets

We will investigate and respond within **72 hours**.

### Security Best Practices

To protect your application using `wavecord`:

- Keep your dependencies up to date
- Never expose Lavalink passwords or bot tokens
- Use trusted Lavalink servers
- Monitor for suspicious behavior in production

---

Thank you for helping us keep `wavecord` secure 💙
